channel.title: Cache Quick
channel.description:
Okay so I've took all my files in my cache's folder, and zipped them into one file like this. I've also changed the cache name from what is coded in the client.
[img]http://puu.sh/5gClI.png[/img]
Do I just upload the zip that is inside the folder? And where do I change the name of the cache, and cache link client sided? Thanks

item.title: Cache Quick
item.dc:creator: @Elixium Elixium
item.description:
@Elixium wrote:

do you have teamviewer? il do this 4 u!

item.title: Cache Quick
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

[quote=“Barrickz, post:1, topic:535549”]Okay so I’ve took all my files in my cache’s folder, and zipped them into one file like this. I’ve also changed the cache name from what is coded in the client.

Do I just upload the zip that is inside the folder? And where do I change the name of the cache, and cache link client sided? Thanks[/quote]

The file that tells the client where the cache is loaded is signlink.java. Also what is your reasoning for this? Honestly don’t get what your trying to do here.

Read full topic
